content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":88491,"originalJapaneseLine":"「子供ってなぁ、恐れ知らずだからねぇ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kids, you know, they don't know fear.\""},{"lineNumber":88492,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほれ、向こうへ行きな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Here, go over there."},{"lineNumber":88493,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ふ〜〜〜っ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Phew~~~\""},{"lineNumber":88494,"originalJapaneseLine":"タハコの煙がナギの体を通り過ぎる。","translatedEnglishLine":"The smoke from the tobacco passes through Nagi's body."},{"lineNumber":88495,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わぷっ、煙くちゃい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah, the smoke is stinky!\""},{"lineNumber":88496,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ？　臭くない……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? It doesn't smell bad..."},{"lineNumber":88497,"originalJapaneseLine":"　むしろ……甘い？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rather... sweet?\""},{"lineNumber":88498,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リンゴの香りだー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's the scent of apples!\""},{"lineNumber":88499,"originalJapaneseLine":"「イヒヒ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe..."},{"lineNumber":88500,"originalJapaneseLine":"　安心しな、害はないよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don't worry, it's harmless.\""},{"lineNumber":88501,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスに言ってからミステリアは","translatedEnglishLine":"After saying that to Rance, Mysteria"},{"lineNumber":88502,"originalJapaneseLine":"大きくタハコの煙を吸い込んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"deeply inhaled the tobacco smoke."},{"lineNumber":88503,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふ〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Fuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu\""},{"lineNumber":88504,"originalJapaneseLine":"　〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜","translatedEnglishLine":"~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~"},{"lineNumber":88505,"originalJapaneseLine":"　〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜〜」","translatedEnglishLine":"~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~\""},{"lineNumber":88506,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、お、おおおお！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-o-ohhh!?!"},{"lineNumber":88507,"originalJapaneseLine":"　な、なんだその煙の量は！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"W-what is with that amount of smoke!?\""},{"lineNumber":88508,"originalJapaneseLine":"ミステリアが一息で吐き出す煙は","translatedEnglishLine":"The smoke Mysteria exhales in one breath"},{"lineNumber":88509,"originalJapaneseLine":"明らかに常軌を逸しており、","translatedEnglishLine":"is clearly beyond normal,"},{"lineNumber":88510,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達の足下はもくもくと煙で覆われた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the area around Rance and the others' feet was engulfed in thick smoke."},{"lineNumber":88511,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわ、こら、すごい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa, this is amazing...\""},{"lineNumber":88512,"originalJapaneseLine":"「天国みたい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's like heaven!\""},{"lineNumber":88513,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ちょっと待って！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, wait a minute!"},{"lineNumber":88514,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんか動いてる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Something's moving!\""},{"lineNumber":88515,"originalJapaneseLine":"中庭を埋め尽くしていた煙が","translatedEnglishLine":"The smoke that had filled the courtyard"},{"lineNumber":88516,"originalJapaneseLine":"それぞれ形を取り始める。","translatedEnglishLine":"began to take various shapes."},{"lineNumber":88517,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うさぎになったー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It turned into a rabbit!\""},{"lineNumber":88518,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こっちはうしだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This one is a cow!\""},{"lineNumber":88519,"originalJapaneseLine":"煙の塊が色々な動物の形を取り、","translatedEnglishLine":"The masses of smoke took the shapes of various animals,"},{"lineNumber":88520,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっという間に中庭を動き回り始めた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and before long they began moving around the courtyard."},{"lineNumber":88521,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおおお……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa...\""},{"lineNumber":88522,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こりゃ、まるで遊園地の催しというか……","translatedEnglishLine":"This is like some event at an amusement park or something..."},{"lineNumber":88523,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんともメルヘンだな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"So very fairytale-like...\""},{"lineNumber":88524,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わあ、なになに！？　すごーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wow, what is this!? Amazing!\""},{"lineNumber":88525,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きゃっきゃっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heehee!\""},{"lineNumber":88526,"originalJapaneseLine":"辺りはあっという間に煙の動物が","translatedEnglishLine":"The area quickly became like a zoo where smoke animals"},{"lineNumber":88527,"originalJapaneseLine":"走り回る動物園のような様相と化し、","translatedEnglishLine":"were running around everywhere,"},{"lineNumber":88528,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを見つけた子供達がまた集まってきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and children who saw this quickly gathered again."},{"lineNumber":88529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「煙ってこんな風に動かせるのか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So you can make smoke move like this...\""},{"lineNumber":88530,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これは特殊な煙だけどね、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is special smoke, though,"},{"lineNumber":88531,"originalJapaneseLine":"　多分魔力を用いて精製されてる」","translatedEnglishLine":"probably refined using magical power.\""},{"lineNumber":88532,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いたのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You were here.\""},{"lineNumber":88533,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今来たとこ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I just got here.\""},{"lineNumber":88534,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……お前も遊び回っていいぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You can play around too.\""},{"lineNumber":88535,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しないわよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I won't.\""},{"lineNumber":88536,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おや？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh?\""},{"lineNumber":88537,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あー……消えてっちゃう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, ah... it's disappearing...\""},{"lineNumber":88538,"originalJapaneseLine":"時間にしてたった五分。","translatedEnglishLine":"It lasted only five minutes."},{"lineNumber":88539,"originalJapaneseLine":"夢のような時間は","translatedEnglishLine":"The dreamlike moment"},{"lineNumber":88540,"originalJapaneseLine":"煙の霧散という形で終わりを告げた。","translatedEnglishLine":"came to an end as the smoke dispersed into mist."},{"lineNumber":88541,"originalJapaneseLine":"残ったのは煙から漂っていた残り香のみ。","translatedEnglishLine":"What remained was only the lingering fragrance from the smoke."},{"lineNumber":88542,"originalJapaneseLine":"そして、それすら風に煽られて","translatedEnglishLine":"And even that was blown away by the wind,"},{"lineNumber":88543,"originalJapaneseLine":"すっかり消えてしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"completely vanishing."},{"lineNumber":88544,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あー、おわっちゃったー……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, it's over...\""},{"lineNumber":88545,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、魔女がいない！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, the witch is gone!\""},{"lineNumber":88546,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ！？　どこにいったの！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh!? Where did she go!?\""},{"lineNumber":88547,"originalJapaneseLine":"「探そう探そう！　きっと、あっちだよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's look for her! She's probably that way!\""},{"lineNumber":88548,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh!\""},{"lineNumber":88549,"originalJapaneseLine":"バタバタと子供達は走り去っていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The children ran off hurriedly."},{"lineNumber":88550,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ〜あ、ようやく行ったかい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, finally they left.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「子供ってなぁ、恐れ知らずだからねぇ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kids, you know, they don't know fear."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: タハコの煙がナギの体を通り過ぎる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The smoke from the tobacco passes through Nagi's body.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに言ってからミステリアは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After saying that to Rance, Mysteria

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きくタハコの煙を吸い込んだ。
な、なんだその煙の量は！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-what is with that amount of smoke!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ミステリアが一息で吐き出す煙は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The smoke Mysteria exhales in one breath

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明らかに常軌を逸しており、
ランス達の足下はもくもくと煙で覆われた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the area around Rance and the others' feet was engulfed in thick smoke.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中庭を埋め尽くしていた煙が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The smoke that had filled the courtyard

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それぞれ形を取り始める。
煙の塊が色々な動物の形を取り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The masses of smoke took the shapes of various animals,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あっという間に中庭を動き回り始めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and before long they began moving around the courtyard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こりゃ、まるで遊園地の催しというか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is like some event at an amusement park or something...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんともメルヘンだな……」
「わあ、なになに！？　すごーい！」
辺りはあっという間に煙の動物が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The area quickly became like a zoo where smoke animals

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 走り回る動物園のような様相と化し、
それを見つけた子供達がまた集まってきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and children who saw this quickly gathered again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「煙ってこんな風に動かせるのか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So you can make smoke move like this..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 多分魔力を用いて精製されてる」
時間にしてたった五分。
煙の霧散という形で終わりを告げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: came to an end as the smoke dispersed into mist.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残ったのは煙から漂っていた残り香のみ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What remained was only the lingering fragrance from the smoke.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして、それすら風に煽られて
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And even that was blown away by the wind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すっかり消えてしまった。
「探そう探そう！　きっと、あっちだよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Let's look for her! She's probably that way!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バタバタと子供達は走り去っていった。

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
